channel.description:
Continuing the discussion from [OGM Workshop Group 1 output](https://forum.openglobalmind.com/t/ogm-workshop-group-1-output/413):
This is a place to discuss and revise:
> **5. Participants** : *Maintain sufficient cohesion to generate value* > CONTEXT: Within an economic/ecological system with vast inequality… > IF: On the one hand there are problems that affect everyone just about equally BUT there are resources that only some people have access to > THEN: Networks that pull together the various resources are a critical part of relating from the parts to the whole, which generates ‘value’ of various kinds (cf. the multiple capitals theory)… > > * Whereby different people can learn from each other and unlearn habits → > * that harm wholeness Leading towards connecting the connectors → > > **tl;dr**: *People, organizations, and communities seeking a better way*
